title: The X-Ray Simualtor 2
features: It's easy and it is real fun.
description: This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-ray functionality.Welcome to "X-Ray Cam"! Just one simple click and save your photo to your photo album.It's easy and it is real fun.Prank!!!
